metrics.name: Number of cases with PO changes
metrics.description: Number of cases with PO changes

metrics.name: Total number of cases with changes
metrics.description: Total number of cases with change events

metrics.name: PO Item changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with PO Item changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${po_change_event_flow})))
	/
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${po_creation_events}))
	)
	* 100
    
    -- ILIKE '%Update%'

metrics.name: Percentage of cases with manual changes
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that contain change events executed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ${change_events}) 
    	AND BOOL_OR(${manual_changes_condition})))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of cases with changes
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that contain change events

metrics.name: Average number of changes per case
metrics.description: Average number of change events per case

metrics.name: Percentage of change events per case
metrics.description: Average percentage of change events per case

metricsVariables.name: po_change_event_flow
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating changes to purchase order item, for example 'Update PO Item Net Price'

metricsVariables.name: po_creation_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

metricsVariables.name: manual_changes_condition
metricsVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was executed manually, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog'

metricsVariables.name: change_events
metricsVariables.description: Events referring to changes made to the case, for example 'Update PO Item PO Quantity', 'Update Opportunity Amount'

metricsVariables.name: po_change_event_flow_1
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating changes to purchase order item, for example 'Update PO Item Net Price'
metricsVariables.value: ('Update PO Item Quantity' | 'Update PO Item Plant' | 'Update PO Item Net Price' | 'Update PO Item Material')

metricsVariables.name: po_creation_events_1
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

children.name: Overview
PO Changes Dashboard Overview

blocks.text: This dashboard provides a breakdown of Purchase Order changes
Page 1: Key metrics to get a picture of the health of your Purchase Order
Page 2: Deep dive into further analysis of PO changes and where there are reworks
Page 3: A list of Case details in order to look further into root causes.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

children.name: KPIs
Number of cases with changes
children.description: Total number of cases that have at least one change event

children.name: Number of cases with PO changes
Percentage of cases with changes
Number of cases with PO Item Quantity changes
Number of cases with PO Net Item Price changes
Percentage of cases with manual changes
Total Invoice Amount effected by Changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Local Curr.")
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Update Contract Net Price' ,'Update Contract Target Quantity' ,'Update Order Confirmation' ,'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date' ,'Update PO Currency' ,'Update PO Item Material' ,'Update PO Item Net Price' ,'Update PO Item Plant' ,'Update PO Item Quantity' ,'Update PO Payment Terms' ,'Update PO Vendor' ,'Update PR Delivery Date' ,'Update PR Material' ,'Update PR Net Price' ,'Update PR Quantity')

children.name: No. of Vendors with Changed Cases

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Vendor Name") AS "No. of Vendors"
FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
WHERE
EVENT_NAME IN 
('Update Contract Net Price' ,'Update Contract Target Quantity' ,'Update Order Confirmation' ,'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date' ,'Update PO Currency' ,'Update PO Item Material' ,'Update PO Item Net Price' ,'Update PO Item Plant' ,'Update PO Item Quantity' ,'Update PO Payment Terms' ,'Update PO Vendor' ,'Update PR Delivery Date' ,'Update PR Material' ,'Update PR Net Price' ,'Update PR Quantity')

children.name: No. of POs with Multiple Quantity Change Events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(CASE_ID)
FROM
(
 SELECT
  COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "CASE_COUNT", CASE_ID, EVENT_NAME
 FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
 WHERE
  EVENT_NAME IN ('Update PO Item Quantity') 
 GROUP BY 2,3
) AS SUB1
WHERE "CASE_COUNT" > 1

children.name: No. of POs with Multiple Price Change Events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(CASE_ID)
FROM
(
 SELECT
  COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "CASE_COUNT", CASE_ID, EVENT_NAME
 FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
 WHERE
  EVENT_NAME IN ('Update PO Item Net Price') 
 GROUP BY 2,3
) AS SUB1
WHERE "CASE_COUNT" > 1

children.name: PO Net Item Price Changes
PO Item Quantity Changes
Percent of change events per case
PO Change Rate
Number of cases with PO Confirmed Delivery Date Change
Total number of cases
Average number of changes per case
Analysis
No. of POs with Multiple Quantity Change Events by PO Vendor Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", "PO Vendor Name"
FROM (SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "CASE_COUNT", CASE_ID, EVENT_NAME, "PO Vendor Name"
FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Update PO Item Quantity')
GROUP BY 2, 3, 4) AS SUB1
WHERE "CASE_COUNT" > 1
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: No. of POs with Multiple Price Change Events by PO Vendor Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", "PO Vendor Name"
FROM (SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "CASE_COUNT", CASE_ID, EVENT_NAME, "PO Vendor Name"
FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Update PO Item Net Price')
GROUP BY 2, 3, 4) AS SUB1
WHERE "CASE_COUNT" > 1
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: No. of Cases with Changes by PO Vendor Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", "PO Vendor Name"
FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Update Contract Net Price', 'Update Contract Target Quantity', 'Update Order Confirmation', 'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date', 'Update PO Currency', 'Update PO Item Material', 'Update PO Item Net Price', 'Update PO Item Plant', 'Update PO Item Quantity', 'Update PO Payment Terms', 'Update PO Vendor', 'Update PR Delivery Date', 'Update PR Material', 'Update PR Net Price', 'Update PR Quantity')
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Total No. of Cases & No. of Cases with Changes by PO Vendor

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "Total No. of Cases",
COUNT(DISTINCT IF(CHANGES = 1, CASE_ID, NULL)) AS "Cases with Changes",
"PO Vendor"
FROM
(
 SELECT
   CASE_ID,
   IF(EVENT_NAME IN ('Update Contract Net Price' ,'Update Contract Target Quantity' ,'Update Order Confirmation' ,'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date' ,'Update PO Currency' ,'Update PO Item Material' ,'Update PO Item Net Price' ,'Update PO Item Plant' ,'Update PO Item Quantity' ,'Update PO Payment Terms' ,'Update PO Vendor' ,'Update PR Delivery Date' ,'Update PR Material' ,'Update PR Net Price' ,'Update PR Quantity'),1,NULL) AS CHANGES,
   "PO Vendor"
 FROM
  (
     SELECT
        CASE_ID,
        EVENT_NAME,
        "PO Vendor Name" AS "PO Vendor"
     FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
     --WHERE "PO Purchasing Group" IS NOT NULL
    ) AS SUB1
) AS SUB2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 20

children.name: Total No. of Cases & No. of Cases with Changes by PO Material Group

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "Total No. of Cases",
COUNT(DISTINCT IF(CHANGES = 1, CASE_ID, NULL)) AS "Cases with Changes",
"PO Material Group"
FROM
(
 SELECT
   CASE_ID,
   IF(EVENT_NAME IN ('Update Contract Net Price' ,'Update Contract Target Quantity' ,'Update Order Confirmation' ,'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date' ,'Update PO Currency' ,'Update PO Item Material' ,'Update PO Item Net Price' ,'Update PO Item Plant' ,'Update PO Item Quantity' ,'Update PO Payment Terms' ,'Update PO Vendor' ,'Update PR Delivery Date' ,'Update PR Material' ,'Update PR Net Price' ,'Update PR Quantity'),1,NULL) AS CHANGES,
   "PO Material Group"
 FROM
  (
     SELECT
        CASE_ID,
        EVENT_NAME,
        "PO Item Material Group Text" AS "PO Material Group"
     FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
     WHERE "PO Item Material Group Text" IS NOT NULL
    ) AS SUB1
) AS SUB2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 20

children.name: Total No. of Cases & No. of Cases with Changes by PO Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "Total No. of Cases",
COUNT(DISTINCT IF(CHANGES = 1, CASE_ID, NULL)) AS "Cases with Changes",
"PO Type"
FROM
(
 SELECT
   CASE_ID,
   IF(EVENT_NAME IN ('Update Contract Net Price' ,'Update Contract Target Quantity' ,'Update Order Confirmation' ,'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date' ,'Update PO Currency' ,'Update PO Item Material' ,'Update PO Item Net Price' ,'Update PO Item Plant' ,'Update PO Item Quantity' ,'Update PO Payment Terms' ,'Update PO Vendor' ,'Update PR Delivery Date' ,'Update PR Material' ,'Update PR Net Price' ,'Update PR Quantity'),1,NULL) AS CHANGES,
   "PO Type"
 FROM
  (
     SELECT
        CASE_ID,
        EVENT_NAME,
        "PO Type" AS "PO Type"
     FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
     --WHERE "PO Purchasing Group" IS NOT NULL
    ) AS SUB1
) AS SUB2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 20

children.name: Total No. of Cases & No. of Cases with Changes by Invoice Payment Term

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE_ID) AS "Total No. of Cases",
COUNT(DISTINCT IF(CHANGES = 1, CASE_ID, NULL)) AS "Cases with Changes",
"Invoice Payment Term"
FROM
(
 SELECT
   CASE_ID,
   IF(EVENT_NAME IN ('Update Contract Net Price' ,'Update Contract Target Quantity' ,'Update Order Confirmation' ,'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date' ,'Update PO Currency' ,'Update PO Item Material' ,'Update PO Item Net Price' ,'Update PO Item Plant' ,'Update PO Item Quantity' ,'Update PO Payment Terms' ,'Update PO Vendor' ,'Update PR Delivery Date' ,'Update PR Material' ,'Update PR Net Price' ,'Update PR Quantity'),1,NULL) AS CHANGES,
   "Invoice Payment Term"
 FROM
  (
     SELECT
        CASE_ID,
        EVENT_NAME,
        "Last FI Invoice Item Terms of Payment Key" AS "Invoice Payment Term"
     FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
    ) AS SUB1
) AS SUB2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 20

children.name: No. of Cases with Rework & Avg. Cycle Time by Vendor (Top 50)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "No. of Cases", 
AVG ((SELECT LAST ("END_TIME") - FIRST ("END_TIME"))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 50

children.name: Case Details
Details of POs with Multiple Quantity change events

dataSource.query:
SELECT --DISTINCT
"Case Id",
"PO Number",
"PO Item No.",
"PO Type",
"Purchasing Group",
"PO Material Group",
"PO Material",
"PO Creation Date",
"Vendor Number",
"Vendor Name",
"CASE_COUNT" AS "PO Quantity Changes"
FROM
(
 SELECT DISTINCT
  COUNT("CASE_ID") OVER (PARTITION BY "CASE_ID","EVENT_NAME") AS "CASE_COUNT", 
  CASE_ID AS "Case Id", 
  "PO Id" AS "PO Number",
  "PO Item" As "PO Item No.",
  "PO Type",
  "PO Purchasing Group Text" AS "Purchasing Group",
  "PO Item Material Group Text" AS "PO Material Group",
  "PO Item Material Text" AS "PO Material",
  "PO Creation Date",
  "PO Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number",
  "PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
 FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Update PO Item Quantity') 
) AS SUB
WHERE
CASE_COUNT > 1

children.name: Details of POs with Multiple Price change events

dataSource.query:
SELECT --DISTINCT
"Case Id",
"PO Number",
"PO Item No.",
"PO Type",
"Purchasing Group",
"PO Material Group",
"PO Material",
"PO Creation Date",
"Vendor Number",
"Vendor Name",
"CASE_COUNT" AS "PO Net Price Changes"
FROM
(
 SELECT DISTINCT
  COUNT("CASE_ID") OVER (PARTITION BY "CASE_ID","EVENT_NAME") AS "CASE_COUNT", 
  CASE_ID AS "Case Id", 
  "PO Id" AS "PO Number",
  "PO Item" As "PO Item No.",
  "PO Type",
  "PO Purchasing Group Text" AS "Purchasing Group",
  "PO Item Material Group Text" AS "PO Material Group",
  "PO Item Material Text" AS "PO Material",
  "PO Creation Date",
  "PO Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number",
  "PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
 FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Update PO Item Net Price') 
) AS SUB
WHERE
CASE_COUNT > 1
